txt.en: You have presented your honorary badge, and may now collect lost envelopes
Collected invitations ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Look around Bree for envelopes that have blown away. They couldn't have gone far....'
'Thank you for the invitations, [placeholder].\n\n'That was nearly a disaster, but now we can get the word out about the festival!'

Percy Bywood has lost the invitations he intended to send out to inform everyone of the anniversary festival.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

'Hail, friend. Might I ask a favour of you?\n\n'I was put in charge of sending out invitations to the residents of Bree, to let them know of the festival events underway. Maybe you received one yourself? Well, I was about to send out another stack of envelopes when a strong wind came along and blew them all away! Can you collect the invitations around town for me?'
'Look around Bree for envelopes that have blown away. They couldn't have gone far....'
Open envelopes you find to collect invitations ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The envelopes are scattered around Bree.\n\nPercy Bywood has asked you to look inside envelopes scattered around town return to him any invitations you find.

'Hail, friend. Might I ask a favour of you?

'I was put in charge of sending out invitations to the residents of Bree, to let them know of the festival events underway. Maybe you received one yourself? Well, I was about to send out another stack of envelopes when a strong wind came along and blew them all away! Can you collect the invitations around town for me?'

'You will need a Postman's Badge in order to help. Talk to Bree's Postmaster to obtain an honorary badge. This is an important task, but we wouldn't want to break any laws in the process.'
The envelopes are scattered around Bree.\n\nPercy Bywood has asked you to look inside envelopes scattered around town return to him any invitations you find.

'Ah, I see that you have acquired the badge needed to assist me. Very well.

'Collect any envelopes you may find strewn about town. Open them, and return any invitations back here to me. I suppose you can figure out what to do with anything else you might find inside.'
 
<rgb=#FF0000>After collecting an envelope, open it from your inventory to search for invitations.</rgb>
Percy Bywood is near the Boar-fountain in Bree.\n\nYou should return the invitations you found to Percy Bywood.
Percy Bywood is near the Boar-fountain in Bree.\n\nYou should return the invitations you found to Percy Bywood.
'Look around Bree for envelopes that have blown away. They couldn't have gone far....'
'I must insist that you have a postman's badge before handling envelopes. I wouldn't want you to do anything illegal.\n\n'The Bree Postmaster is granting daily requests for honorary badges, nearby.'

'Hail, friend. Might I ask a favour of you?\n\n'I was put in charge of sending out invitations to the residents of Bree, to let them know of the festival events underway. Maybe you received one yourself? Well, I was about to send out another stack of envelopes when a strong wind came along and blew them all away! Can you collect the invitations around town for me?'
'Thank you for the invitations, [placeholder].\n\n'That was nearly a disaster, but now we can get the word out about the festival!'
